data.comment: The match has started.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to San Luis.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Queretaro at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
San Luis's Pablo Barrera gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
San Luis have a dangerous throw-in.
Diego Montano Robles signals a San Luis throw-in in Queretaro's half.
In the minute 14, Pablo Lopez for San Luis drives towards goal at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez. But the finish is unsuccessful.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Queretaro.
In the minute 17, Queretaro have a goal kick.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Queretaro in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, San Luis to take a throw-in in Queretaro territory.
Free kick for San Luis in the half of Queretaro.
In the minute 27, Throw-in San Luis.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal! German Berterame gives San Luis a 1-0 lead.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to San Luis.
San Luis's Jorge Sanchez misses with an attempt on goal.
Diego Montano Robles awards Queretaro a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Queretaro at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
San Luis's Ventura Alvarado breaks free at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 37, Jonathan Perlaza is on a sub for Erik Vera for Queretaro.
In the minute 38, San Luis have a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Omar Islas with Omar Arellano. This is the second substitution made today by Alex Diego.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 41, Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick San Luis.
In the minute 43, Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 45, Free kick Queretaro.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
The first-half is over at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Ventura Alvarado (San Luis) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Diego Montano Robles awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Alex Diego is making the team's third substitution at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez with Jonathan Betancourt replacing Hugo Silveira.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Queretaro just outside San Luis's area.
In the minute 49, In San Luis de Potosi Queretaro attack through Kevin Ramirez. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 52, San Luis are pushing forward but Pablo Barrera's finish is wide of the goal.
Diego Montano Robles awards Queretaro a goal kick.
In the minute 53, San Luis have a goal kick.
Axel Werner (San Luis) has received a yellow card from Diego Montano Robles.
Diego Montano Robles signals a San Luis throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Queretaro.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Queretaro.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 60, Can Queretaro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Luis's half?
Throw-in Queretaro.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
In the minute 62, Free kick for San Luis in the half of Queretaro.
Queretaro's Daniel Cervantes has been booked in San Luis de Potosi.
Diego Montano Robles signals a Queretaro throw-in in San Luis's half.
In the minute 64, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of San Luis.
Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 66, Pablo Lopez (San Luis) gets a yellow card.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles waits before resuming play because Jonathan Betancourt for Queretaro is still down.
In the minute 69, At Alfonso Lastras Ramirez, Ramiro Gonzalez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick San Luis.
Goal kick for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 74, San Luis's Anderson Julio breaks free at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 74, San Luis have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Guillermo Vazquez (San Luis) is making a first substitution, with Matias Catalan replacing Juan Castro.
Diego Montano Robles awards Queretaro a goal kick.
San Luis needs to be cautious. Queretaro have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 76, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
German Berterame is booked for the home team.
Free kick for Queretaro in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 78, Fernando Madrigal gets an equalizer for Queretaro. The score is now 1-1.
Angel Sepulveda with an assist there.
Queretaro's Jonathan Betancourt is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 80, Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 82, San Luis make their second substitution with Rodrigo Noya replacing Anderson Julio.
In San Luis de Potosi Queretaro's Angel Sepulveda is caught offside.
In the minute 83, In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
San Luis take a 2-1 lead thanks to Pablo Barrera.
Mauro Quiroga is replacing Pablo Barrera for the home team.
Sebastian Sosa is replacing Angel Sepulveda for Queretaro at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 86, Alex Diego is making the team's fifth substitution at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez with Francisco Rivera replacing Fernando Madrigal.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Queretaro.
In the minute 88, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Sebastian Sosa for Queretaro has been booked by Diego Montano Robles and receives a first yellow card.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a throw-in for Queretaro, close to San Luis's area.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Mauro Quiroga gets his shot on target but fails to score for San Luis.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Queretaro in the half of San Luis.
In San Luis de Potosi Queretaro attack through Alfonso Luna. The finish is off target, however.
San Luis have a goal kick.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Goal kick for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
The match has come to a close in San Luis de Potosi. The final score is 2-1.
